examples.translation: 他详细列出全部被盗的财物。
这项工作每一点都必须做到正确无误。
examples.first: This work should be done correctly in all

examples.translation: 只要把它完成了，你怎么做我并不计较。
examples.last: how you do it as long as it gets done.

adj: unique or specific to a person or thing or category
separate and distinct from others of the same group or category
surpassing what is common or usual or expected
n: a fact about some part (as opposed to general)
a small part that can be considered separately from the whole
(logic) a proposition that asserts something about some (but not all) members of a class

adj: 特别的, 独有的; 挑剔的; 详细的
n: 个别项目, 详细说明
